tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
quoteText: "Do Not Track" Notice: Because the providers of "do not track" and similar signals do not yet operate according to common, industry-accepted standards, we currently do not respond to those signals. For more information on Do Not Track, please visit www.allaboutdnt.com.
